subject: style: replace emojis with Ionicons in header and settings modal
body:
- Replace refresh emoji with Ionicons refresh icon
- Replace settings emoji with Ionicons settings-outline
- Replace pull-to-refresh arrow with Ionicons arrow-down
- Update SettingsModal with consistent Ionicons:
  - help-circle-outline for Help & Tutorial
  - notifications/notifications-off-outline for Browser Notifications
  - radio/radio-outline for Push Notifications
  - trash-outline for Clear All Data
  - chevron-forward for row indicators
- Use semantic colors (success for enabled, error for blocked/delete)
title: replace emojis with Ionicons in header and settings modal
